DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myToolTip: Shows a grid of the surface around the entity (land or water)
DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: This task takes samples in box around the entity and creates a tactical graphic on each sample location. If the location is water (or unspecified), a cross (TRP) is created; if it is land, an X in a circle (Coordination Point) is created. The grid is always 10x10; its size is determined by the sample spacig parameter.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>sampleSpacing</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Sample Spacing</myLabel> <myToolTip>The horizontal and vertical spacing between sample locations in the grid.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>100</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>1</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
